00005 #define PAGE_PRESENT   0x1
00006 #define PAGE_WRITE     0x2
00007 #define PAGE_USER      0x4
00008 #define PAGE_WRITETHROUGH 0x8
00009 
00010 #define PAGE_DIR_VIRTUAL_ADDR   0xFFBFF000
00011 #define PAGE_TABLE_VIRTUAL_ADDR 0xFFC00000
00012 
00013 //Macros to find the page directory index and the page table index of a entry
00014 #define PAGE_DIR_IDX(x) ((MEM_LOC) x / (PAGE_SIZE / sizeof(MEM_LOC)) )
00015 #define PAGE_TABLE_IDX(x) ((MEM_LOC) x % (PAGE_SIZE / sizeof(MEM_LOC)) )
00016 
00017 #define KERNEL_START 0xC0000000
00018 #define KERNEL_RESERVED_START KERNEL_START + 0x20000000
00019 #define KERNEL_MEMORY_END 0xFFFFFFFF
